findings.lung_bases: Lung bases are clear. No pleural or pericardial effusion. A right cardiophrenic lymph node is unchanged.
findings.liver: Massively enlarged measuring up to 28 cm in craniocaudal dimension. The liver attenuation is somewhat hypodense suggestive of fatty deposition.
findings.gallbladder: Surgically absent with clips in gallbladder fossa and a small amount of fluid compatible with recent postoperative status. CBD is nondilated.
findings.spleen: Enlarged up to 15 cm. No focal lesion.
findings.kidneys: Symmetric enhancement and prompt excretion without hydronephrosis or signs of pyelonephritis.
findings.GI: Appendix is abnormally thickened, dilated up to 1 cm concerning for early acute appendicitis. Trace free fluid noted. No free air.
findings.vascular: Abdominal aorta normal in caliber without aneurysmal dilatation.
findings.lymph_nodes: Scattered retroperitoneal nodes present. A left periaortic node measures approximately 1.4 x 0.9 cm, previously unchanged. A portacaval node is enlarged measuring approximately 1.4 x 3.1 cm.
findings.pelvis: Bladder moderately well distended and grossly unremarkable. No pelvic free fluid or inguinal/pelvic sidewall adenopathy. Small bilateral inguinal fat containing hernias are symmetric.
findings.bones: Exostosis arising from the right inferior pubic ramus is re-demonstrated. No suspicious lytic or blastic lesion identified.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: A left periaortic node measures approximately 1.4 x 0.9 cm, previously present unchanged. A portacaval node is enlarged compared to previous measurements.
